p:
The results of this study indicate that the invasive evergreen Prosopis uses a significant amount of water (3.1 to 3.3 billion m 3 per year over invaded areas) in the Afar Region. Considering that the annual precipitation in the study region is approximately 560 mm
29 , our findings indicate that Prosopis consumes about half of the amount of water received from precipitation in the invaded area in the Afar Region (Appendix 1).
